titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Robert Snell, Judgment
CWG5009

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Kentucky Scott Circuit Court
November Term 1857 November 16
The Commonwealth of Kentucky Plaintiff
against Misdemeanor
"Robert Snell Defendant

This day came the comths attorney and the defendant appeared by his attorney By consent It is adjudged that the defendant pay one hundred dollars his fine to the commonwealth of Ky & the costs of this prosecution"

A Copy May 16 1864
Att J W Halloway clk
By Geo E. West D C

"Portion owing to commonwealth, attorney Said
W. S. Darnaly county atty,"
Attest J W Halloway clk
By Geo E West D. C.

Commonwealth Ky
vs } Judgt & credit
Robert Snide

A True copy
Attest J W Halloway ^clk^
By gb Gimon D C
